languages.text: осталось последнее испытание — как Тень стала кровью флагмана, так и игрок должен стать ей
"Не видишь? Не видишь!" {n}Здена лихорадочно мотает головой и принимается сдирать с себя обноски вместе с гниющей плотью.{/n} "Чтобы видеть, тебе нужно стать как Здена. Кровью и плотью корабля!"

"You don't see, do you? You don't see!" {n}Zdena shakes her head frantically and starts tearing off her rags. Strips of her decaying flesh peel off along with them.{/n} "You will not see until you become like Zdena. The flesh and blood of this ship!"
languages.original_text: "Не видишь? Не видишь!" {n}Здена лихорадочно мотает головой и принимается сдирать с себя обноски вместе с гниющей плотью.{/n} "Чтобы видеть, тебе нужно стать как Здена. Кровью и плотью корабля!"

traits.locale_text: "You don't see, do you? Do you?" {n}Zdena shakes her head frenziedly and starts tearing off her tatters along with her own decaying flesh.{/n} "You will not see until you become like Zdena. The flesh and blood of this ship!"

"You don't see, do you? Do you?" {n}Zdena shakes her head frenziedly and starts tearing off her tatters along with her own decaying flesh.{/n} "You will not see until you become like Zdena. The flesh and blood of this ship!"

"You don't see, do you? You don't see!" {n}Zdena shakes her head frantically and starts tearing off her rags. Strips of her decaying flesh peel off along with them.{/n} "You will not see until you become like Zdena. The flesh and blood of this ship!"

"You don't see, do you? You don't see!" {n}Zdena shakes her head frantically and starts tearing off her rags. Strips of her decaying flesh peel off along with them.{/n} "You will not see until you become like Zdena. The flesh and blood of this ship!"

"You don't see, do you? You don't see!" {n}Zdena shakes her head frantically and starts tearing off her rags. Strips of her decaying flesh peel off along with them.{/n} "You will not see until you become like Zdena. The flesh and blood of this ship!"

"You don't see, do you? You don't see!" {n}Zdena shakes her head frantically and starts tearing off her rags. Strips of her decaying flesh peel off along with them.{/n} "You will not see until you become like Zdena. The flesh and blood of this ship!"

languages.text: «No ves, ¿verdad? ¡No ves!». {n}Zdena sacude la cabeza con desesperación y empieza a arrancarse los andrajos. Tiras de piel putrefacta caen con la ropa.{/n} «No verás hasta que seas como Zdena. ¡La carne y sangre de esta nave!».
languages.original_text: "You don't see, do you? You don't see!" {n}Zdena shakes her head frantically and starts tearing off her rags. Strips of her decaying flesh peel off along with them.{/n} "You will not see until you become like Zdena. The flesh and blood of this ship!"

traits.locale_text: «No ves, ¿verdad? ¡No ves!». {n}Zdena sacude la cabeza con desesperación y empieza a arrancarse los andrajos. Tiras de piel putrefacta caen con la ropa.{/n} «No verás hasta que seas como Zdena. ¡La carne y sangre de esta nave!».

languages.text: 「見てないのね？見ていない！」{n}ズデナは激しく頭を振り、身にまとっているボロ布を引き裂き始める。それと同時に、彼女の朽ち果てた肉片も一緒に剥がれ落ちる。{/n}「お前はズデナのようになるまで見ることはないんだ。この船の肉と血に！」
languages.original_text: "You don't see, do you? You don't see!" {n}Zdena shakes her head frantically and starts tearing off her rags. Strips of her decaying flesh peel off along with them.{/n} "You will not see until you become like Zdena. The flesh and blood of this ship!"

traits.locale_text: 「見てないのね？見ていない！」{n}ズデナは激しく頭を振り、身にまとっているボロ布を引き裂き始める。それと同時に、彼女の朽ち果てた肉片も一緒に剥がれ落ちる。{/n}「お前はズデナのようになるまで見ることはないんだ。この船の肉と血に！」

languages.text: “你看不到，是吧？你看不到！”{n}兹迪娜疯狂地摇着头，撕扯着她身上的衣物，腐烂的肉体也被一起扯了下来。{/n}“只有变得像兹迪娜一样，你才能看到这一切！看到这艘船的血肉！”
languages.original_text: "You don't see, do you? You don't see!" {n}Zdena shakes her head frantically and starts tearing off her rags. Strips of her decaying flesh peel off along with them.{/n} "You will not see until you become like Zdena. The flesh and blood of this ship!"

traits.locale_text: “你看不到，是吧？你看不到！”{n}兹迪娜疯狂地摇着头，撕扯着她身上的衣物，腐烂的肉体也被一起扯了下来。{/n}“只有变得像兹迪娜一样，你才能看到这一切！看到这艘船的血肉！”

languages.text: "Ihr könnt nicht sehen, oder? Ihr könnt nicht sehen!" {n}Zdena schüttelt wild den Kopf und reißt sich ihre Lumpen vom Leib. Dabei lösen sich auch Streifen ihres verrottenden Fleischs.{/n} "Ihr werdet nicht sehen, bis Ihr werdet wie Zdena. Das Fleisch und Blut dieses Schiffs!"
languages.original_text: "You don't see, do you? You don't see!" {n}Zdena shakes her head frantically and starts tearing off her rags. Strips of her decaying flesh peel off along with them.{/n} "You will not see until you become like Zdena. The flesh and blood of this ship!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt nicht sehen, oder? Ihr könnt nicht sehen!" {n}Zdena schüttelt wild den Kopf und reißt sich ihre Lumpen vom Leib. Dabei lösen sich auch Streifen ihres verrottenden Fleischs.{/n} "Ihr werdet nicht sehen, bis Ihr werdet wie Zdena. Das Fleisch und Blut dieses Schiffs!"

languages.text: « Vous ne voyez pas, n'est-ce pas ? Vous ne voyez pas ! » {n}Zdena secoue frénétiquement la tête et se met à déchirer ses haillons, sans se rendre compte qu'elle arrache dans le même temps des lambeaux de sa propre chair en décomposition.{/n} « Vous ne verrez pas tant que vous ne serez pas comme Zdena. La chair et le sang de ce vaisseau ! »
languages.original_text: "You don't see, do you? You don't see!" {n}Zdena shakes her head frantically and starts tearing off her rags. Strips of her decaying flesh peel off along with them.{/n} "You will not see until you become like Zdena. The flesh and blood of this ship!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne voyez pas, n'est-ce pas ? Vous ne voyez pas ! » {n}Zdena secoue frénétiquement la tête et se met à déchirer ses haillons, sans se rendre compte qu'elle arrache dans le même temps des lambeaux de sa propre chair en décomposition.{/n} « Vous ne verrez pas tant que vous ne serez pas comme Zdena. La chair et le sang de ce vaisseau ! »

languages.text: "Görmüyorsun, değil mi? Görmüyorsun!" {n}Zdena, çılgına dönmüş bir hâlde kafasını sallayarak paçavralarını parçalamaya başlıyor. Paçavralarıyla birlikte çürüyen etinden şeritler de sıyrılıyor.{/n} "Zdena gibi olana dek görmeyeceksin. Bu geminin eti ve kanı!"
languages.original_text: "You don't see, do you? You don't see!" {n}Zdena shakes her head frantically and starts tearing off her rags. Strips of her decaying flesh peel off along with them.{/n} "You will not see until you become like Zdena. The flesh and blood of this ship!"
